mapper.select: SELECT a.ActivityID, a.ActName, a.StartAt, a.EndAt, r.ItemID, r.ItemNum, i.ItemName, i.isDuplicate, COALESCE(p.UserName, '无参与') AS UserName, -- 没有参与记录时，UserName 设为 '无参与' COALESCE(p.CurrentProgress, 0) AS CurrentProgress, -- 没有参与记录时，CurrentProgress 设为 0 a.TotalProgress, COALESCE(p.hasRedeemedReward, 0) AS hasRedeemedReward -- 没有参与记录时，hasRedeemedReward 设为 0 FROM activity AS a LEFT JOIN reward AS r ON a.ActivityID = r.ActivityID LEFT JOIN item AS i ON r.ItemID = i.ItemID LEFT JOIN participation AS p ON a.ActivityID = p.ActivityID AND p.UserName = #{username} -- 对特定用户进行过滤 WHERE NOW() < a.EndAt;
